about_the_game:
Nightmare Flight is a horror game that takes place in an airplane. Survive through three different horror scenarios, while trying to fly an airplane without a co-pilot. You must check on the passengers, and noises from the plane, but do not leave the cockpit for too long. The Undead, Aliens, and different creatures have boarded the plane. They will try to grab, attack, and drag you to your death. Fly the plane, while fighting off these monsters to survive the flight.

Nightmare Flight is an immersive first person horror game. The player can sit in the cockpit to fly the plane, and then get up to walk down the aisle and check on passengers and noises. Creatures are lurking in the corners of the plane, waiting to attack and scare the player. 

Nightmare Flight is a short single player horror game that will take around an hour to complete. This game was made by a single developer.
